actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Social Security Act to include Mississippi among the States which may provide coverage for policemen and firemen under their agreements entered into pursuant to that section.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to include Mississippi among the States which may provide coverage for policemen and firemen under their voluntary agreements for coverage of state and local employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Social Security Act to include Mississippi among the States which may provide coverage for policemen and firemen under their agreements entered into pursuant to that section.
